page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date relative generate minute method

argument.name: minute
argument.description: The delta in minutes between two dates.

return.name: minute
return.description: The correctly formatted representation of the delta in minutes.

page.description: Method used to generate how minutes should be representation in a relative date. For example turning "1" into "1 minute", and "3" into "3 minutes". See *[link:Date.toRelative]*.
